name: tasmota
description: Tasmota device support for shelly-cli - detect, monitor, and control Tasmota-based smart home devices

hints.scene: Tasmota uses Rules for automation. See: https://tasmota.github.io/docs/Rules/
hints.script: Tasmota uses Berry scripting on ESP32. See: https://tasmota.github.io/docs/Berry/
hints.schedule: Tasmota uses Timers for scheduling. See: https://tasmota.github.io/docs/Timers/
hints.kvs: Tasmota uses Var and Mem commands for persistent storage. See: https://tasmota.github.io/docs/Commands/#control
hints.webhook: Tasmota can send HTTP requests via Rules. See: https://tasmota.github.io/docs/Rules/#rule-trigger
hints.virtual: Tasmota does not support virtual components
